channel.title: Bonnie on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Bonnie on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – April 20, 2019
item.description: Got Bruce’s backpack, good grades also, Dillan our only worry. Drove to Fortville for annual Dellinger Dinner and Easter Egg Hunt, kids had lots of fun even though it rained all day. Went to my parents for Easter Dinner, everyone snacked since we just ate. Looked at three houses.

item.title: Status Update – December 25, 2018
item.description: Christmas! Santa came, left candy coal for Dillan but we added a few more gifts. Indy to Grandpa Avery and Grandma Bonnie’s house after our Christmas morning. Kids got to played with lots of their cousins, had a great time! Memories. I felt sick going, during, on way back, still.

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2018
item.description: Passed out all day. Missed McVay Family Reunion in Fortville, I would’ve died, plus no need to get Bonnie and Ave sick. Lesa took kids to get mail, came back with Dillan’s friend Gabe and sister Gracie. Lesa is a saint, watched kids entire day by herself, not easy for her. Slept!

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2018
item.description: Bruce’s throat swollen/red, doctor visit, has strep throat. Late start for Easter 2018 in Fortville, ate dinner, had Easter egg hunt, kids had good time! Avery and Bonnie Dellinger’s 50th anniversary. Left early, Easter dinner at parents; Jim, Sarah and Kaleigh, Becky and family.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2015
item.description: Dellinger-Ross get together at Fortville Park. Easter egg hunt. Playground. Dinner. Family. Fun.
